meta.job_title: Manhattan Campus Manager, High School Program

duties_responsibilities.duty: Recruit, interview, and train youth from partner high schools.

Lead, plan, schedule, and execute year-round programming for program participants, including STEM curricula, SAT preparation, clinical training, internships, recreation, and professional development programming.
Responsible for ordering and tracking program supplies and managing assigned portions of the program budget.
Develop mutually beneficial relationships with partnering agencies and regularly submit reports with program outcomes.
Provide social, emotional, and career guidance to youth participants and assist in the preparation of reports to partner schools and funders.
Supervise program participants, plan curriculum for enrichment and educational workshops, and implement college counseling and advisement programs as directed.
Perform other related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in the field of social work, education, or related field (Master’s preferred)
